events.name: MONATIK: MADE WITH LOVE AND RHYTHM
events.description: The MONATIK concert is always a celebration for body and soul. Invite your loved ones and relatives, friends and just come for cool emotions!

events.name: Tango on pointe shoes and gala concert
events.performers: Art Ballet Company, led by the leading soloist of Kyiv Modern Ballet Artem Shoshin
events.description: The performance is dedicated to the 100th anniversary of the grand maestro - Astor Piazzolla, which is celebrated in 2021 !!!

events.name: Silence at home
events.description: Strict, strange and at the same time soft music

events.name: Carmen Suite with Ekaterina Kukhar
events.description: The content of Prosper Mérimée's short story, which is revealed in the opera in four acts, is condensed into one in the ballet.

events.name: Lords of the Sound. Music of Hans Zimmer
events.description: TV series, movies, short films and even music for the Oscar - for almost forty years, the master has an impressive array of films that he built.

events.name: 5`NIZZA
events.description: 5`NIZZA is able to create not just songs, but a certain state, mood, bright images and touch with witty and strong lines.
